caption.center: Demetria G. Stavropoulos, defendant in error, v. Harolambos Stavropoulos,
alias Charles Stavropoulos, plaintiff in error.

court.center: Appellate Court of Illinois, First District.

opinion.posture:
Action for money had and received. Judgment for plaintiff.
Error to the Superior Court of Cook county; the Hon. J.C. Eagleton, Judge, presiding. Heard in the third division of this court for the first district at the October term, 1923.
opinion.attorneys: Jacob Levy, for plaintiff in error. B.M. Shaffner, for defendant in error.
opinion.opinion_byline: Mr. Justice Thomson delivered the opinion of the court.
